K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-047:325a-0: @325a dkon @325b mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-047:325a-5: bi lam bi ba le ba la pa te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-047:325a-7: aa mri ta ni ra gho she /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-047:325a-8: rlung mkhris bad kan 'dus pa zhi bar gyur cig sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-047:325a-9: nad pa'i sman la gdab bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-047:325a-10: stong chen mo nas phyung ba sman la sngags kyi gdab pa rdzogs so ////
